ThingDef.Name: QM_LiberatorHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Liberator
ThingDef.description: This heavy revolver is a revolver made by a dark heavy duty metal alloy. Commissioned by the Church it has characteristics of a traditional pistol mixed with sleek design of futuristic look. Chambered in rifle cartridge of 7.91 it makes it up for it's poor muzzle velocity performance. As a personal defense weapon it makes any vulgerian think twice before robbing the faithful.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_LiberatorMHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Liberator-M
ThingDef.description: This handcannon is a modified version of a Liberator pistol. The prolonged barrel offers better muzzle velocity and presence. While less concealable and bulkier than it's original version, there is nothing more unsettling as seeing the abbot with this in thier hand walking toward you.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_RedeemerHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Redeemer
ThingDef.description: This dark handcannon is a complete overhaul of Liberator. Replacing most of the inner and outer parts with improved dark polymer instead of alloy. It achieves even better velocity than previous modification. Furter enchanced with a laser pointer attachment makes the already formidable upgrade even more precise. Really popular amongst the inquisition aspirants.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_LawHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Law
ThingDef.description: This handcannon is, although doesn't look like it. Is officially from Liberator linage. While the Redeemer was complete overhaul, Law is complete reimagination of a Liberator. Turning the six shooter to four shooter, Law might hold less rounds but it's aim is absolute as devotion of its wielder.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_OrderHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Order
ThingDef.description: Reverenced four shooter handcannon. Gleaming with golden encasing all of it's parts are byproduct of countless blessing and rites undertaken by it's creator. By unknown means it's bullets deals more damage than it should and even more so against unholy and eldritch alike. It is highly favored by Church for it's potent symbolization.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_JeffhammerSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Jeffhammer
ThingDef.description: Jeffhammer, named after revered figure Saint Jeff. Commissioned by the Church for self defense and concealment, the automatic shotgun excels at it's role, altough many members prefer Liberator for tradition. It can be quickly drawn and shot but accuarcy sharply drops over distances due to short barrel. Four blast of twelve gauge is still four blast of twelve gauge, muzzle velocity be damned\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_JeffhammerMDSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Jeffhammer-MD
ThingDef.description: Modified version of Jeffhammer automatic shotgun. This modification comes with full stock and longer barrel length, allowing the automatic shotgun have better performance over medium range engagement sacrificing the original's quick draw. Monks are usually found praying to this more often than the altar of woreship.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_JeffhammerC22SG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Jeffhammer-C22
ThingDef.description: This dark automatic shotgun is a complete overhaul of Jeffhammer-MD. Replacing most of the inner and outer parts with improved dark polymer. It allows far better recoil handling not only that it comes with optics attachment making the weapon easier to handle over longer ranges accurately. The pious can't live off a prayer alone.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_AnathemaSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Anathema
ThingDef.description: Reverenced automatic shotgun. Gleaming with golden encasing etched with Church symbols, all of it's parts are byproducts of countless riting and blessing. Trully by unknown means this shotgun's blast is far deadlier than it should be, And even more so against unholy and eldritch alike. almost if as god's disfavor being delivered from it's barrel. It is only seen in hands of Archcanon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_HunterRF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hunter
ThingDef.description: This dark bolt action rifle is only chambered with two rounds. Commissioned by the church it has unmistakable characterestics of bolt action rifle. With a special sequenced fire mode it can unleash it's contents in one trigger pull, making it twice as lethal. This rifle is very popular in civilian market, as it offers a cost-effective alternative for those unable to obtain permits for assault rifles. Often seen holstered missionaries from Church to keep the devils at bay.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_HunterRXRF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hunter-RX
ThingDef.description: This dark rifle is a modified version of Hunter rifle. Upgraded with a scope for improved accuracy, along with modifications to the trigger mechanism and body frame for a semi-automatic firing mode. With a five round revolving capacity, it significantly increases lethality of the weapon. The heavier barrel mitigates the sequenced shot's recoil allowing faster recoil recovery. Abbots prefer to display this alongside their image of Lord.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_EnigmaPTHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Enigma-PT
ThingDef.description: Enigma-PT is a modified Enigma for personal defense use. Size reducement makes this gun into being easily concealed in public space without drawing attention. Making it popular amongst the public positions of the various mega corporations. It is at cost of effective range and armor penetration of the original.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_EnigmaHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Enigma
ThingDef.description: Enigma is a spacer's choice or so says the advertisement for magnetic gun. It's a miniature railgun that propels a small projectile piece to high velocity, shooting it this way makes it versatile in void warfare as barrel of the gun never overheat and bend in prolonged use. While the damage might be seen as lacking it still punches through medium armor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_EnigmaM2HG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Enigma-M2
ThingDef.description: Enigma-M2 is improved variant of Enigma. Enchanced with longer frame, and stronger magnets propels projectiles to superior acceleration. Allowing the miniature railgun even better armor penetration results than it's original variant. Favored choice amongst spaceport guards and void warfare specialists as the backup gun.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_EnigmaSupremeRF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Enigma-Supreme
ThingDef.description: Enigma Supreme is a marksman rifle version of Enigma model. This conversion from a handgun to marksman rifle is very welcome one as the increase in the magnets propels the projectile to such velocity that it rip through even the toughest of power armor. leaving behind scorching devastation. Strangely it is light enough to be used as side arm despite it's size and bulk.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_String21MHG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona String-21M
ThingDef.description: String-21M is a energy pistol from Sunlight Covenant. Unlike its predessors this weapon diverges from it in favor of new technology. Its sleek design harmonizes with it's radical belief in merging technology with faith. Protects the rightous and deliver divine justice upon the sinners. Praise the Sun!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

li.label: Burst shot
li.description: Fire stable burst of a plasma projectiles

ThingDef.Name: QM_Supernova7KSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Supernova-7K
ThingDef.description: Supernova-7K is a energy blaster from Sunlight covenant. With its sleek design it reflects the radical beliefs of its designers. When the sinners arrives at Eden's gate, faitful shall draw weapons and unleash waves of searing plasma to swiftly bring divine judgment upon those who seek to tempt the righteous and pious.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

li.label: Burst shot
li.description: Fire stable burst of a plasma projectiles

ThingDef.Name: QM_EnlightenmentMKRF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Enlightenment-MK
ThingDef.description: Enlightenment-MK is a energy rifle of Sunlight covenant. With its design reflecting its nature of its creator and their intent. Delivering searing plasma to sinners across the land was never this efficient and clean. However, caution is advised as even the might of the Enlightenment-MK may falter against the metal demons.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

li.label: Burst shot
li.description: Fire stable burst of a plasma projectiles
